snippet: A five-alarm brush fire swept through the former Fresh Kills landfill on Staten Island on Monday, and fires also erupted in New Jersey and on Long Island.
abstract: A five-alarm brush fire swept through the former Fresh Kills landfill on Staten Island on Monday, and fires also erupted in New Jersey and on Long Island.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and HANNAH MIET

headline.main: Brush Fires Across Region Are Spread by High Winds
headline.print_headline: Brush Fires Across Region Are Spread by High Winds
